sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- <v-app id="app" :style="cssProps"></v-app> -->
  <v-app id="app" :style="cssProps">
    <AppBar :drawer='drawer' @openDrawer='toggleDrawer' @closeDrawer='toggleDrawer' />
    <AppNavDrawer :drawer='drawer' />
    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid class="px-0">
        <router-view />
        <SnackBar />
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
    <v-footer app padless>
      <AppFooter />
    </v-footer>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import AppBar from '@/components/layout/AppBar'
import AppNavDrawer from '@/components/layout/AppNavDrawer'
import AppFooter from '@/components/layout/AppFooter'
import SnackBar from '@/components/shared/SnackBar'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    AppBar,
    AppNavDrawer,
    AppFooter,
    SnackBar,
  },
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
  }),
  computed: {
    cssProps() {
      var themeColors = {}
      Object.keys(this.$vuetify.theme.themes.light).forEach((color) => {
        themeColors[`--v-${color}`] = this.$vuetify.theme.themes.light[color]
      })
      return themeColors
    }
  },
  methods: {
    toggleDrawer(value) {
      this.drawer = value
    }
  },
}
</script>
